SK_COLLABORATION.short_desc: Working effectively with others while maintaining clarity and boundaries.
SK_COLLABORATION.strength_desc: You engage others constructively and hold your ground without friction.
SK_COLLABORATION.growth_desc: With more confidence, this capability can express more consistently in complex teams.

SK_DECISION_MAKING.short_desc: Making sound judgments when information is incomplete or shifting.
SK_DECISION_MAKING.strength_desc: You are comfortable acting without full clarity and adapting as things evolve.
SK_DECISION_MAKING.growth_desc: This capability will strengthen further with higher-stakes or visible decisions.
